content: As an AI language model, I'm happy to help with any challenges regarding studying or time management. Remember, it's important to focus on your goals and stay motivated. Change your study routine, try new methods, and keep a positive attitude. Don't forget to take care of yourself too, get enough sleep, eat well, and exercise regularly. If you need more assistance, don't hesitate to ask for help from a teacher or tutor. Good luck with your exams!
